headline.main: BRITISH DESCRIBE COMMANDOS' RAID; Trained Saboteurs 'Invaded' Bardia From Small Boats, Fired Targets and Escaped AXIS FORCES HOODWINKED Defenders, Fearing Full Dress Attack, Brought Up Tanks and Guns to Find Foe Gone

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 14 (U.P.) -- Britain's Commandos, the black-uniformed men of the night, raided Bardia, Libya, so realistically one night last Spring that German and Italian occupying forces, thinking a full-scale invasion was underway, brought out tanks and armored units to protect themselves, it was disclosed tonight.
abstract: Brit War Office discloses night raid on Bardia last Spring by Commandos, special invasion troops

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
